maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/78/se.orig: Let us follow Carla for now.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/78/se.text: Continue de suivre Carla pour le moment.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/80/se.text: Bienvenue à bord du M.S. Solar !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/80/se.note: "de: le quai est impressionnant pas mal"

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/80/se.orig: Y'know, the view here is nice, but you gotta see what's beyond the bow.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/80/se.text: T'sais, la vue est pas mal ici, mais c'est rien à côté de ce que l'on peut voir de la proue !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/80/se.orig: We're currently steering towards Rhombus Square. That's something to look at!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/80/se.text: On se dirige actuellement vers Rhombus Square. C'est quelque chose à voir !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/80/se.orig: Actually, why not go to the bow and explain the situation to Lea there?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/80/se.text: En fait, pourquoi ne pas aller sur la proue et expliquer la situation à Lea là-bas ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/80/se.orig: Seeing Rhombus Square will make it easier for her to understand, correct?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/80/se.text: Quand elle verra Rhombus Square, elle comprendra de quoi tu parles, non ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/82/se.orig: S...\. Sorry, I'm busy checking the containers here.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/82/se.text: D...\. Désolé, je suis occupé à vérifier ces conteneurs.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: Hi!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: Salut !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: Hello there! You must be a guest on this ship, right?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: Bonjour toi ! Tu dois être un invité sur ce navire, non ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: Why, don't be shy! We seamen may look rough, but we're easygoing folks, really.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: Oh, ne sois pas timide ! On a l'air rudes comme des marins, mais on est des gars sympas, en fait.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.note: german is more colorful : "we have manners of seamens, but in reality we are very calm

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: You want to know what I'm doing here?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: Tu veux savoir ce que je fais ici ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: [acquiesce]

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: I'm currently checking up on the solar panels here.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: Je suis en train de vérifier ces panneaux solaires là.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: These are our primary energy source, so they better work properly!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: C'est notre source d'énergie principale, donc ils ont intérêt à fonctionner !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: Otherwise our nice and shiny M.S. Solar won't budge a centimeter.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: Sinon notre joli M.S. Solar ne bougera pas d'un centimètre.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: Trust me, being stuck in the ocean too long is not something you want to experience.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: Et crois-moi, être coincé en plein océan trop longtemps, ce n'est pas quelque chose que tu as envie de vivre.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: [shakes head]
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: ...No?\. Then what else?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: ... Non ?\. Alors quoi ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: This isn't going anywhere.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: On ne va pas aller loin comme ça.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: Just let me do my work, okay?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: Laisse-moi faire mon travail, OK ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: [Yes]
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: [Oui]

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: [No]
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: [Non]

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: Huh... I suppose he did not even notice you are an avatar.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: Huh... J'imagine qu'il n'a même pas remarqué que tu es un avatar.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: Well, the human appearance is pretty convincing.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: C'est que l'apparence humaine est assez convaincante.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: Except for the hair color...
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: Sauf pour la couleur de cheveux...

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: Oh... who are you?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: Oh... qui es-tu ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: You don't look like a proper seaman. So, I reckon you're a guest?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: Tu ne ressembles pas à un marin. Tu es peut-être une visiteuse ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: Not very talkative, huh? Sorry, I'm in the middle of a maintenance routine.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: Pas très causante, mmm ? Désolé, mais je suis en plein milieu de travaux de maintenance.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: So... if you'd excuse me.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: Donc... Si tu peux m'excuser.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: Hi!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: Salut !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: Oh! You are back again? That's a surprise.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: Oh ! Tu es de retour ? C'est étonnant.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: Last time I wasn't even aware that you were one of these "avatars" from the game.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: La dernière fois, je ne savais même pas que tu étais un de ces "Avatars" du jeu.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: In fact, to me you just looked like one of these fancy youngsters with their colorful hair and tacky clothes.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: En fait, pour moi tu ressemblais à un de ces jeunots typiques qui se baladent tous avec leurs cheveux teintés et leurs fringues kitsch.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: Oh, and horns. Are horns "in" these days?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: Oh, et des cornes. Est-ce que les cornes sont "in" en ce moment ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: [shakes head]
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.orig: I...\. I see? Anyway, I hope you enjoy your stay!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/83/se.text: J...\. Je vois ? Je te souhaite un bon séjour à bord !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/86/se.orig: Ah, look who's here.\. You must be that avatar, right?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/86/se.text: Ah, regarde qui est là.\. Tu dois être cet avatar, non ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/86/se.orig: Well then, welcome to the M.S. Solar!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/86/se.text: Bon alors, bienvenue sur le M.S. Solar !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/86/se.orig: If you lean over the railing a bit you might even see the name of the ship.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/86/se.text: Si tu te penches un peu au-dessus du rail, tu peux même voir le nom du navire.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/86/se.orig: Oi, make sure you don't fall into the sea.\. I'm pretty sure avatars are bad at swimming.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/86/se.text: Hé, fais gaffe de ne pas tomber dans la mer.\. Je crois savoir que les avatars ne savent pas nager.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/87/se.orig: I have no idea what is going on, but you better listen to the Cap' and get going!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/87/se.text: Je ne sais pas ce qui se passe, mais tu devrais écouter le cap' et y aller !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/91/se.orig: Hey, can't you see I'm busy here?\. ... Wait, who are you?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/91/se.text: Hé, tu vois pas que je suis occupé là ?\. ... Attends, qui es-tu ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/91/se.orig: Oh right, I remember now.\. You're that pseudo-robot thing.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/91/se.text: Ah oui, je me souviens.\. Tu es ce machin-pseudo-robot là.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/91/se.orig: Oh, no offense.\. You see, I just recently had this discussion with a colleague.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/91/se.text: Oh, rien de personnel.\. Tu sais, j'ai récemment eu cette discussion avec un collègue.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/91/se.orig: It was about avatars being the same as robots.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/91/se.text: C'était à propos des avatars qui étaient pareils que des robots.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/91/se.orig: And I have to insist they are not!\. Avatars are just some fragile, temporary collection of instant matter.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/91/se.text: Et je suis vraiment pas d'accord ! Les avatars sont juste des amas fragiles et temporaires fait d'Instant-matière.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/91/se.orig: Everybody knows real robots are made of metal.\. Like these beauties here.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/91/se.text: Tout le monde sait que les vrais robots sont faits en métal.\. Comme ces beautés-là.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/91/se.orig: So I just can't share the excitement of my colleagues about your presence.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/91/se.text: Donc je ne comprends pas l'excitation de mes collègues de te voir ici.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/91/se.orig: You're just an avatar.\. No true robot, see?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/91/se.text: Tu es juste un avatar.\. Pas un vrai robot.\. Tu comprends ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/91/se.orig: Anyway, I have to take care of my babies here.\. So if you'll excuse me...
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/91/se.text: Bon sinon, il faut que je m'occupe de mes petits là.\. Donc si tu peux m'excuser...

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/92/se.orig: Oh my!\. That's some extremely colorful hair you have there.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/92/se.text: Hé ben !\. Ça c'est de la couleur de cheveux.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/92/se.orig: I had heard that avatar designs tend to be flamboyant, but... really?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/92/se.text: J'ai cru comprendre que le design des avatars était extravagant, mais... à ce point ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/92/se.orig: You're not happy about them either, huh?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/92/se.text: Tu ne les aimes pas non plus, hein ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/92/se.orig: Now I have to wonder who put those things on you.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/92/se.text: Maintenant je me demande qui te les a mises.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/93/se.text: Je dois dire, je suis étonné.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/93/se.orig: I expected the embodiment of some gamer kiddie's wildest dreams.\. Lots of beefcake and such.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/93/se.text: Je m'attendais à une représentation de l'imaginaire d'un gamer.\. Un gros mastoc avec plein de piquant et tout.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/93/se.orig: Yet, here we have such a cute girl.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/93/se.text: Mais, là on a une jolie petite fille.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/93/se.orig: Too bad that doesn't really say anything about the player's actual appearance.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/93/se.text: Dommage que ça ne dise rien sur l'apparence réelle du joueur.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/93/se.orig: Just like in the old days of MMOs.\. Some things never change.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/93/se.text: Exactement comme au bon vieux temps des MMOs.\. Certaines choses ne changent jamais.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/122/s.orig: Bow is this way.\. It's a bit of a walk, though.\. Just follow me.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/122/s.text: La proue est par là.\. Il faut marcher un peu.\. Après moi !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/122/s.orig: Go to the bow of the ship.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/122/s.text: Allez vers la proue du navire.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/122/s.orig: Carla, what were all of those destructible boxes doing in that room anyway?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/122/s.text: Carla, pourquoi est-ce qu'il y avait des boîtes destructibles dans cette salle ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/122/s.orig: I was just practicing how to use those things, y'know?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/122/s.text: Oui je sais, il fallait que j'apprenne à utiliser ces machins.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/122/s.orig: Probably should have done that somewhere else.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/122/s.text: J'aurais p'têt dû faire ça ailleurs.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/123/s.orig: Now, girl, have a look at this!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/123/s.text: Voila, Lea, regarde un peu moi ça !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.orig: Well, I guess this cleared up some things at least, right?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.text: Bon, j'espère que c'est un peu plus clair maintenant, non ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.orig: Alright then, I think this is a good time to split.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.text: Bon alors, je pense qu'il est temps de se séparer.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.orig: I'm gonna go talk to the captain and try to set up that combat lesson for you.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.text: Il faut que j'aille voir le capitaine pour discuter de ton entrainement au combat.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.orig: Meanwhile you can have a look around the ship, if ya like.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.text: Pendant ce temps-là, tu peux visiter le navire, si tu veux.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.orig: The crew knows about ya.\. I guess you already noticed that, right?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.text: L'équipage est au courant pour toi.\. Je pense que tu l'as déjà remarqué, non ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.orig: You can meet me and the captain later.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.text: Tu peux revenir me voir avec le capitaine plus tard.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.orig: Until then! Just make sure not to fall into the water, girl!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.text: On se revoit ! Et n'essaie pas de jouer l'équilibriste sur les barrières !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.orig: By the way, Lea.\. I had a closer look at those speech synchronization issues.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.text: Pendant qu'on y est, Lea.\. J'ai regardé plus en détail le problème avec ta synchronisation de la parole.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.orig: Unfortunately I do not think I will be able to fix them soon.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.text: Je crains que je puisse pas réparer ça rapidement.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.orig: However, I found a little workaround.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.text: Par contre, j'ai quand même trouvé un contournement.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.orig: I might be able to hard-code specific audio patterns into your speech module.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.text: Je dois pouvoir programmer quelques modèles de vocalisations dans ton module vocal.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.orig: ...That means you will be able to say certain words.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.text: ... Cela veut dire que tu pourras dire certains mots.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.orig: That should help a bit, correct?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.text: Cela devrait t'aider un peu, n'est-ce pas ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.orig: So, let us try it out.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.text: Alors, essayons ça.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.orig: Hi
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.text: Salut

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.orig: Hi!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.text: Salut !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.orig: Hi!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.text: Salut !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.orig: Hi! Hi! Hi!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.text: Salut ! Salut ! Salut !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.orig: It works! That should help you start some conversations with the crew here.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.text: Ça fonctionne ! Maintenant tu devrais pouvoir démarrer des discussions avec l'équipage.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.orig: Have a look around the ship.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/125/s.text: Allez vous balader sur le navire.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/126/s.orig: So, ye ready for the battle?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/126/s.text: Bon, tu es prêt pour le combat ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/126/s.orig: That's what I like to hear! Let the battle begin!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/126/s.text: Ça c'est que je veux entendre ! Commençons le duel !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/126/s.orig: Well then, tell me when ye are.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/126/s.text: Bon alors, dis-moi quand tu l'es.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/127/s.orig: Carla!\. Are ye ready up there?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/127/s.text: Carla !\. Est-ce que tu es prête là-bas ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/127/s.orig: Yes, Cap! Don't forget the goggles!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/127/s.text: Bien sûr, cap ! N'oublie pas les lunettes !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/127/s.orig: Haven't worn these for some time...
I was told ye learned the basics down in the cargo hold.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/127/s.text: On m'a dit que tu avais appris les fondamentaux en bas.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/127/s.orig: Still, first I want ye to show me yer grip on aimin' and throwin'.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/127/s.text: Mais avant, je veux en être convaincu.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/127/s.orig: Time to say hello to an old friend!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/127/s.text: Il est temps pour des vielles retrouvailles !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/127/s.orig: Listen carefully.\. I want ye to hit that robot from this distance ten times.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/127/s.text: Écoute bien.\. Je veux que tu touches ce robot 10 fois à cette distance.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/127/s.orig: And do it quickly! Got that?
Quickly hit the target-bot ten times.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/127/s.text: Touchez rapidement la cible-robot dix fois.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: I see ye understand the basics well enough.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Je vois que tu comprends bien les bases.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: That will make things easier.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Ça va rendre les choses plus simples

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: Aye, just as I expected. Ye notice how half o' them balls missed the target?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Aye, comme je m'y attendais. La moitié des boules ont raté leur cible.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: Ye still need to understand how to aim properly.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Il faut encore que tu apprennes à viser correctement.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: Be patient, lass!\. Ye missed yer target too often again.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Pas si vite, fillette !\. Tu rates encore trop souvent ta cible.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: That was way too slow.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: C'était bien trop lent.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: Ye're supposed to quickly throw balls at the target.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Tu étais censé lancer des boules rapidement, pas prendre ton temps !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: Ye're supposed to throw quickly, lass!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: C'est toujours aussi lent, fillette !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: Not one darn charged ball after the other, ye understand?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Arrête de charger tes boules à chaque fois, compris ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: Should I explain the basics to ye again?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Est-ce qu'il faut que je te réexplique les bases ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: [acquiesce]

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: [shakes head]
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: [Yes]
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: [Oui]

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: [No]
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: [Non]

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: Bloody darn hell...
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Bon sang de bon soir...
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.note: player refuses to let captain explain stuff

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: I'll show ye how it's done.\. Watch closely.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: J'vais te montrer comment on fait.\. Regarde bien.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: See them dotted lines? That's the throwing range.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Tu vois ces lignes pointillées ? C'est ton rayon de tir.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: When I now start throwin' balls, they'll be flyin' randomly in between the two lines.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Si je lance maintenant, les boules vont aller n'importe où entre les deux lignes.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: That's some pretty darn sloppy throwin'.\. We won't have that here, ye hear me?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: C'est du lancer digne d'un ivrogne, ça.\. Je veux pas voir ça ici, compris ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: Now fact is, when ye be throwin' balls yer precision will improve over time, like this.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Maintenant, si on lance quelques boules, la précision va s'améliorer avec le temps, comme ça.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: But clearly this takes time!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Mais clairement, cela prend du temps !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: Ye wanna be precise quicker?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Tu veux être plus précis plus rapidement ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: Then ye better \c[3]keep the aim\c[0] and \c[3]stop the darn throwin'\c[0]!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Alors \c[3]concentre-toi sur ta visée\c[0] et surtout, \c[3]arrête de lancer partout\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.note: 'you want to be precise quicker ?'. proposed by massa: Il vaut mieux se concentrer sur la visée pour éviter de les lancer n'importe ou

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: Quick, wasn't it?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: C'était rapide hein ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: Once ye get yer lines connected, ye can throw with high precision.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Une fois que les deux lignes se rejoignent, tu peux lancer précisément.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: See how ye \c[3]keep your precision\c[0] after throwin'?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Tu vois comment tu \c[3]gardes de la précision\c[0] quand tu lances ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: Once ye got the lines connected ye can quickly throw as many precise balls as ye want!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Une fois que les lignes se rejoignent, tu peux lancer précisément autant que tu veux.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: But, yer precision is lost when ye \c[3]change yer aimin' direction\c[0] too quickly.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Mais tu perds de ta précision si tu \c[3]changes la direction où tu vises\c[0] trop rapidement.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.note: from massa. de: ta precision va au diable !!

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: So in short: \c[3]Don't rush with the throwin'\c[0]!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Donc souviens-toi : \c[3]Ne te précipite pas quand tu lances\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.note: de: C'est dans le calme que se trouve le pouvoir

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: First wait for a split second to get the precision.\. Then ye can throw to yer heart's content.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: D'abord, attends un peu pour avoir de la précision.\. Seulement après, tu pourras lancer autant que le coeur t'en dis.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: Alright, ye wanna try again?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: C'est tout, encore un essai ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: [acquiesce]

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: Ye better get it right this time around, lass.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Tu as intérêt à faire ça bien, cette fois, fillette.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: Good, let's see if ye got the message.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Bien, alors montre-moi si tu as compris.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: Quickly hit the target-bot ten times.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Touchez rapidement la cible-robot dix fois.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: Hits
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Coups

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: [shakes head]
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: Yer choice.\. Just keep in mind that good aim is essential for combat.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Ton choix.\. Pense juste que la précision est importante dans un combat.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: Carla!\. We need that turret now!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Carla !\. On a besoin de la tourelle !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: Time to turn on ol' Betty.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Il est temps d'allumer cette vielle Betty.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: Next we'll be practicin' the dash.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Bon, on va continuer avec le sprint.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: The turret will now start shootin' at ye.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: La tourelle va maintenant te tirer dessus.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: I want ye to do two things.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Je veux que tu fasses deux choses.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: First, \c[3]keep yer aim\c[0] on the turret but \c[3]don't throw\c[0] anythin'.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Premièrement, \c[3]Vise\c[0] la tourelle mais \c[3]ne lance rien\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: Second, \c[3]dodge\c[0] the turret's bullets \c[3]without losin' yer aim\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Deuxièmement, \c[3]évite\c[0] les balles de la tourelle mais \c[3]sans perdre ta visée\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: Alright then, let's start.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: Bon, on peut démarrer.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: [Yes]
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: [Oui]

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.orig: [No]
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/129/s.text: [Non]

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/132/s.orig: Ye have to be faster than that, lass.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/132/s.text: Il va falloir être plus rapide que ça, fillette.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/132/s.orig: Don't ye even think about simply walkin' past them shots. Dash at the right moment!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/132/s.text: N'essaie même pas d'éviter les balles en marchant, sprinte au bon moment !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/132/s.orig: Stop right there! Ye need to keep yer aim, lass.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/132/s.text: Arrête ça ! Il faut que tu continues à viser, fillette.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/132/s.orig: This practice is about dodgin' without losin' focus. So keep the crosshair on yer target.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/132/s.text: Le but de cet entrainement, c'est d'esquiver les balles et de garder ta cible dans le viseur.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/132/s.orig: Anyway...\. ye seem to be havin' a hard time with this practice.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/132/s.text: En tout cas, tu as beaucoup de mal avec cet exercice.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/132/s.orig: Remember the way ye do aimin' and dashin'.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/132/s.text: Tu sais déjà comment on vise et on sprinte.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/132/s.orig: It's possible to do both of these things at the same time.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/132/s.text: Maintenant, il faut que tu fasses les deux à la fois.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/132/s.note: de: obtenir les deux sous ton chapeau

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/133/s.orig: Keep your aim and dodge 3 shots.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/133/s.text: Maintenez votre visée et esquivez 3 tirs.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/133/s.orig: Move and press \i[dash] without releasing \i[aim] to dash while aiming.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/133/s.text: Déplacez-vous et appuyez sur \i[dash] sans relâcher \i[aim] pour sprinter en visant.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/134/s.orig: Enough with dodgin'. Now try to handle this attack, lass!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/134/s.text: Ça suffit pour les esquives. Maintenant, montre-moi comment tu te défends contre cette attaque !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/136/s.note: de ? C'est quoi le coucou t'as fait quoi ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/136/s.orig: Don't ye know how to do a darn \c[3]guard\c[0], lass?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/136/s.text: Tu ne sais pas comment on \c[3]bloque\c[0] une attaque, fillette ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/136/s.orig: Actually, Jet... As a matter of fact, she does not.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/136/s.text: En fait, Jet... non, elle ne le sait pas.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/136/s.orig: I forgot to activate her guard module.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/136/s.text: J'ai oublié d'activer son module de défense.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/136/s.orig: Sergey, are ye serious? Ye can't send that lass into battle without a proper shield!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/136/s.text: Sergey, t'es sérieux là ? Tu peux pas envoyer cette fillette au combat sans un bon bouclier !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/136/s.orig: Yes... I will fix that right now.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/136/s.text: Tu as raison... Je vais l'activer maintenant.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/136/s.orig: Good, so now ye have yer shield.\. Need an introduction on how it works?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/136/s.text: Bien, maintenant tu as ton bouclier.\. Besoin d'une introduction sur comment on s'en sert ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/136/s.orig: Aye, then let's have another go!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/136/s.text: Aye, alors essaie donc une nouvelle fois !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/136/s.orig: Ye can do better than that! Let's try this again.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/136/s.text: Tu peux faire mieux que ça ! Essaye encore.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/136/s.orig: Very good! That's all the basics I can teach ye for now.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/136/s.text: Très bien ! C'est toutes les bases que je peux t'apprendre.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/136/s.orig: Now, to round everythin' up, let's have a proper battle against the turret where ye can use everything ye've learned.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/136/s.text: Maintenant, pour finir, tu vas faire un vrai combat contre la tourelle, en utilisant tout ce que tu as appris.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/136/s.orig: Though there will be a little surprise waitin' for ye.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/136/s.text: Mais je te préviens qu'il y aura une petite surprise pour toi.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/136/s.orig: I'll let ye take a short breather.\. Talk to me when ye're ready.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/136/s.text: Je vais te laisser une petite pause.\. Dis-le quand tu es prête.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/136/s.note: de: dit merde quand tu es prête ? (Sag Bescheid, wenn du bereit bist)

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/137/s.orig: Alright, basics first. Just show me the shield.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/137/s.text: OK, on commence par les bases. Montre-moi ton bouclier.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/137/s.orig: Hold \i[guard] or \i[mouse-guard] without moving to guard.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/137/s.text: Maintenez appuyé \i[guard] ou \i[mouse-guard] sans bouger pour vous protéger.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/137/s.orig: Hold \i[gamepad-b] or \i[guard] without moving to guard.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/137/s.text: Maintenez appuyé \i[gamepad-b] ou \i[guard] sans bouger pour vous protéger.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/137/s.orig: Good. Note that the shield will only block the front. Always look into the direction of the attack.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/137/s.text: Bien. Note que ton bouclier ne bloque que le devant. Regarde toujours dans la direction de l'attaque.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/137/s.orig: Move your mouse while guarding to change view direction.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/137/s.text: Déplacez votre souris en vous protégeant pour changer là où vous regardez.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/137/s.orig: Use \i[left-stick] while guarding to change view direction.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/137/s.text: Utilisez \i[left-stick] en vous protégeant pour changer là ou vous regardez.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/137/s.orig: And finally, ye can even aim durin' guard. It's slow but it works.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/137/s.text: Et enfin, tu peux viser pendant que tu te défends. C'est lent mais ça marche.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/137/s.orig: You can also aim while guarding with \i[throw].
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/137/s.text: Vous pouvez également viser en vous protégeant avec \i[throw].

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/137/s.orig: You can also aim while guarding with \i[aim].
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/137/s.text: Vous pouvez également viser en vous protégeant avec \i[aim].

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/138/s.orig: Good. Now, it's about time ye try to block this swarm of balls, right?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/138/s.text: Bien. Maintenant, il est temps d'essayer de bloquer cette rafale, non ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/138/s.orig: Well then, let's go through this again.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/138/s.text: Bon alors, on va réexpliquer ça.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Ms. Avatar! You totally rocked that crab! That was so awesome!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Madame Avatar ! Le crabe s'en est pris plein la figure ! C'était génial !
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.note: de: le crabe s'est montré sauf là ou le marteau pendant ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: But that strange blue guy was pretty amazing, too!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Mais ce type bleu étrange était impressionnant aussi !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Did you see how he just jumped up from the water?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Tu as vu comment il a sauté de l'eau ? Zouuu !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Not to mention how he just dragged you through the air, telepathy style!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Sans parler du fait qu'il t'a trainé dans les airs par télépathie ! Fiouuu !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Very smooth, fellow.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: C'est très sympa, collègue.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Hi...
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Salut...

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Thanks for coming, Ms. Ava...\. err...\. I mean Lea!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Merci d'être venue, Madame ava...\. euh...\. Lea !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Hello, so the pseudo-robot has actually returned.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Bonjour, donc le pseudo-robot est vraiment revenu.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Please, stop calling her that.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: S'il te plaît, arrête de l'appeler comme ça.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: She is an actual person with a name!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: C'est une vraie personne avec un nom !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: [acquiesce]

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Lea!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Lea !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Alright then, Lea.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: OK alors, Lea.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: My colleague and I had a little discussion over how well instant-matter based avatars can handle water.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Mes collègues et moi avons eu une petite discussion, sur comment les avatars faits en instant-matière peuvent supporter l'eau.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: To my knowledge, instant matter easily evaporates when in contact with water.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: À ma connaissance, l'instant-matière s'évapore instantanément au contact de l'eau.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: That's why swimming was never an option with the technology.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: C'est pourquoi les Avatars ne peuvent pas nager, parce que la technologie ne le permet pas.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: But he claims that it can actually withstand decent amounts of water.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Mais il me dit que ça peut supporter une bonne quantité d'eau.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Right! Lea was totally fine when it started raining last time she was here, I saw it myself.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Oui ! La dernière fois, Lea n'avait aucun problème quand il a commencé à pleuvoir. Je l'ai vu de mes propres yeux.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Well, a bit of rain maybe, but let's see how she handles slightly larger amounts of water.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Oui bon, un peu d'eau peut-être, mais voyons voir comment elle va réagir à un peu plus de flotte.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: ...How?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: ... Comment ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Quite simple.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: C'est très simple.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Please stand at this point here for a moment.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Tiens-toi ici pendant un moment.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Why?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Pourquoi ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: No worries, you'll see.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Ne t'inquiète pas, tu verras.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Alright, we're ready!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: OK, on est prêt !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Sorry!\. They talked me into it...
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Désolée !\. Ils m'ont persuadé de le faire...

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Why?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Pourquoi ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: S-Sorry, Lea!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: D-Désolé, Lea !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: But you see? She did not evaporate!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Mais tu vois ? Elle ne s'est pas évaporée !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Hm...\. I have to admit I didn't expect this.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Hm...\. Je ne m'y attendais pas, je dois admettre.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: But that was just the small bucket.\. Now, let's try the larger one!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Mais c'était juste le petit seau.\. Essayons avec le plus gros !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: P-Please. Just one more time.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: S-S'il te plaît, juste encore une fois !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Do it for the science!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Fais-le pour la science !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Alright, second bucket!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: OK, deuxième seau !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Ha, see?\. It couldn't handle that amount!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Ah, tu vois ?\. C'était trop !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Alright, I see...
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: OK, tu as raison...

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: But you know, it could just be a generous safety measure in case avatars actually jump into water.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Mais ça pourrait être un mécanisme de sécurité. Au cas où un avatar plonge vraiment dans l'eau.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Maybe they can potentially take even more water than that.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Peut-être qu'ils peuvent potentiellement résister à encore plus d'eau.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: That may be, but we can't test this now, can we?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Peut-être, mais on peut pas tester ça maintenant, non ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: That's true.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: C'est vrai.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Anyway, my point stands that Instant Matter avatars are just way too fragile for most serious applications.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Dans tous les cas, ma conclusion tient toujours : les avatars en Instant-matière sont trop fragiles pour des applications plus sérieuses.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Come on, not all applications require high water-resistancy.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Allez quoi, toutes les applications ne demandent pas forcément de résister à l'eau.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: If it were just that.\. Did you ever try to lift her?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Si c'était juste ça.\. Tu as déjà essayé de la soulever ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: W-What?\. I'd never dare to do that!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Q-Quoi ?\. Jamais je ne ferais ça !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: ... I sort of expected that.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: ... Je m'y attendais.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: That's why I invited someone to help us out!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: C'est pour ça que j'ai invité quelqu'un d'autre pour nous aider !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Hey, \c[3]Isabelle\c[0]! Could you come over here for a second?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Hé, \c[3]Isabelle\c[0] ! Est-ce que tu peux venir ici rapidement ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Hello!!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Bonjour !!
... Salut ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Oh! Who is that?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Oh, qui c'est ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: ...Lea!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: ... Lea !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Hi Lea!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Bonjour Lea !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: I like your horns!!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: J'adore tes cornes !!

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Yeah, she's another guest on the ship currently.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Oui, c'est une autre invitée sur ce navire en ce moment.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: So why would you have her involved?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Donc pourquoi tu l'as appelée ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: To show you how ridiculously light Instant matter is.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Pour te montrer comment l'Instant-matière est ridiculement léger.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Isabelle, would you be so kind and lift the young lady for us?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Isabelle, es ce que tu peux être gentille et soulever cette jeune femme pour nous ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Can I do that?!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Je peux faire ça ?!

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Of course you can! Show us how strong you are!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Bien sûr que tu peux ! Montre-nous comment tu es forte !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Okay!!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: OK !!
... Salut ?!

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Whoa!!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Ouah !!

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Lea is so light!!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Lea est trop légère !!

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: ...Wait!!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: ... Attends !!

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Oh boy...\. I wasn't aware of that.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Oh mon dieu...\. Je ne le savais pas.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: An avatar should weigh an average of maybe 5-10 kg at most.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Un avatar ne doit pas peser plus lourd que 5-10 kg à la louche.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Instant matter is extremely light and fragile.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: L'Instant-matière est extrêmement léger et fragile.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: It's the tradeoff for being quickly constructed.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: C'est la contrepartie pour un temps de construction court.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: ...Lea Hi Lea Wait Bye Why?!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: ... Lea Salut Lea Attends Bye Pourquoi ?!

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Lea is getting heavy now!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Lea devient de plus en plus lourde !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: It's okay, you can put her down now.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: C'est bon, tu peux la laisser maintenant.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: I want to throw her!!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Je veux la lancer !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Why?!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Pourquoi ?!

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Sure, show us some muscle!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Bien sûr, montre-nous ce que tu as dans tes bras !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Annnd...\. go!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Ettttt...\. zou !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Awesome!!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Trop génial !!
... Comment ?!

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Again!!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Encore !!

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Wait!!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Attends !!

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: So you see?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Donc tu vois ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Super light, low water resistance and believe me, any kind of real impact and it breaks down.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Extrêmement léger, ne résiste pas trop à l'eau, et crois-moi, une bonne collision et ça se casse.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Alright, I see what you mean.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: C'est bon, je vois ce que tu veux dire.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Still, instant matter does have its applications outside of games, doesn't it?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Mais quand même, l'Instant-matière a quand même une application en dehors des jeux. Non ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Wait!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Attends !
... Pourquoi ?!

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Of course it has applications.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Bien sûr que ça a des applications.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: But it will never replace good, hard machinery and architecture.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Mais ça ne va jamais remplacer des machines lourdes ou des bâtiments.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: You can't build a house with instant matter and expect to live in it. It would break down easily.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Tu ne peux pas construire une maison en Instant-matière et espérer vivre dedans. Elle s'écroulerait rapidement.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Hahaha, again!!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Hahaha, encore !!

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Wait!!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Attends !!

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: It works for CrossWorlds because everything running around the playground is based on instant matter or virtual.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Cela fonctionne pour CrossWorlds parce que le Terrain de jeu est soit basé sur de l'Instant-matière soit virtuel.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: It's like a theme park made out of Styrofoam.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: C'est comme un parc d'attraction en polystyrène.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: I see...
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Je comprends...

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Ahh... I'm beat.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Ahh... tu as gagnée.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Lea, you run real fast!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Lea, tu cours vraiment vite !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Oh... so either Lea's player is in quite good shape or avatars are not bound to the player's stamina.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Oh... donc soit le joueur de Lea est en forme ou alors les avatars ne sont pas liés à l'endurance du joueur.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: It's the latter. You can run for as long as you want and won't get tired.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Le deuxième. Tu peux courir autant que tu veux, sans jamais être fatigué.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Anyway, thanks a lot for everything, Lea!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: En tout cas, merci pour ta collaboration, Lea !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: And sorry for all the water and... throwing.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Et désolé encore pour toute l'eau et... les lancers.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Ahhh... please don't hate me!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Ahhh... me regarde pas comme ça !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: I just wanted to show him how awesome avatars are!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Je voulais juste lui montrer comment les avatars sont géniaux !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Nice work then, you really showed him!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Ah ben bravo, c'est très réussi !
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.note: de: c'était un bon pied dans le feu ! (pétard mouillé)

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Ugh...\. was it really that bad for you?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Heu...\. c'était vraiment trop gênant pour toi ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: [shakes head]
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Well... I'm relieved...
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Ouf... Je suis soulagé...

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: It was fun!\. I want to throw Lea again!!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: C'était fun !\. Je veux encore lancer Lea !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Come on, give her a little rest, okay?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Allez, laisse-la se reposer un peu, OK ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Aw man, okay... See you later!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Bon, d'accord... À plus !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Hey Lea...\. I see you are having fun with the crew?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Hé, Lea... Je vois que tu t'amuses avec l'équipage ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: I will soon start preparing things to get you back into the Playground.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Je vais bientôt préparer quelques trucs pour que tu retournes sur le Terrain de jeu.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: It will take a bit of time, though.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Cela va prendre un peu de temps, par contre.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: It is probably a good idea to log you off in the meantime.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Et c'est probablement une bonne idée de te déconnecter entre-temps.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Before that, though...\. There is something we should talk about.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Avant ça, par contre...\. Il y a une chose dont il faudrait parler.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Since you know the truth about yourself...
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Vu que tu connais la vérité à propos de toi-même...

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: You are probably feeling a great deal of... uncertainty, correct?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: ... Ça doit te rendre assez perplexe, non ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: In particular, about your future.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Surtout, pour ton avenir.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: [acquiesce]

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: I...\. I do not want to give you any false hope.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Je...\. Je ne veux pas te donner de faux espoirs.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Your current situation... is problematic.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Ta situation actuelle... est problématique.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: The only place for Evotars to exist is within CrossWorlds without official permission.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Le seul endroit où les Évotars peuvent exister, c'est dans CrossWorlds, et sans autorisation officielle.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: And this will only last as long as we can keep it secret from Instatainment.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Et cela aussi longtemps que Instatainment l'ignore.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: This is something we have to change, Lea.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Il faut que l'on change cela, Lea.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: This is our goal.\. To create a \c[3]proper place for Evotars\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: C'est notre but.\. On doit créer un \c[3]endroit où les Évotars peuvent exister\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: One where you do not have to hide your identity.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Un endroit où tu n'as plus besoin de cacher ton identité.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Satoshi...\. he always envisioned a place like that, even back then.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Satoshi...\. Il a toujours rêvé d'un endroit comme cela, même à l'époque.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Finding him is just the first step towards our goal.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Le retrouver, c'est juste la première étape à franchir.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: With his help, we might find a way to get there.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Avec son aide, on va peut-être pouvoir y arriver.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Well then...\. should we call it a day?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Bon alors... On peut se dire que c'est tout pour aujourd'hui ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: [acquiesce]

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Good night, Lea.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Bonne nuit, Lea.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.orig: Bye!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/143/s.text: Bye !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/146/s.orig: I told ya!\. She thrashes everything with one hit!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/146/s.text: Je t'l'avais dit !\. Elle pulvérise tout en un seul coup !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/146/s.orig: Sergey, what's the meaning of this?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/146/s.text: Sergey, qu'est-ce que ça veut dire ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/146/s.orig: W-Well...\. you see...\. That was a mistake on my end.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/146/s.text: O-Oui ben...\. tu vois...\. C'est de ma faute.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/146/s.orig: How's the lass supposed to learn anythin' being that overpowered?!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/146/s.text: Comment la fillette peut-elle apprendre quelque chose en étant aussi surpuissante ?!

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/146/s.orig: I'm sorry to interrupt, but we need you on the bridge!\. Right now!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/146/s.text: Je suis désolé de vous interrompre, mais on a besoin de vous dans la cabine !\. Maintenant !
Bon sang ! Qu'est-ce qui se passe ?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/146/s.note: de: le temps est à l'orage, as an expression... except it's actually raining afterwardz

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/146/s.orig: Something is approaching us and quickly!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/146/s.text: Quelque chose vient vers nous et à grande vitesse !
Et il fallait que ça soit maintenant...

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/146/s.orig: Sorry lass, we have to stop here.\. Duty calls.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/146/s.text: Désolé, mais il faut interrompre l'entrainement.\. Le devoir m'appelle.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/146/s.orig: Carla, ye clean up the balcony first and come to the bridge afterwards.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/146/s.text: Carla, tu nettoies le balcon puis tu me rejoins dans la cabine.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/146/s.orig: Girl, I have no idea what's going on here, but it'd be better for you to go inside too.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/146/s.text: Je sais pas ce qui se passe, Lea, mais tu ferais mieux de rentrer aussi.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.orig: What a peculiar location we have here.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.text: C'est vraiment un endroit peu commun que l'on a là.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.orig: It's a darn cargo ship, ye dobber!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.text: C'est un porte-conteneur, sale voyou !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.orig: Ye look like someone who jumped right out of CrossWorlds.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.text: De quel trou de CrossWorlds tu sors, toi ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.orig: This ship is not part of the bloody playground.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.text: Ce navire ne fait pas partie du satané Terrain de jeu.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.orig: So, don't be a nuisance and get lost.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.text: Donc viens pas nous emmerder ici et tire-toi.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.note: de is 'auf den sack gehen', and wikipedia translates it as 'viens pas nous les casser'

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.orig: We are aware of the nature of this place.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.text: Nous connaissons déjà la nature de ce lieu.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.orig: Yet we perceive the presence of another misplaced individual.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.text: Mais nous percevons la présence d'une autre personne étrangère.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.orig: ... That's none of yer bloody business!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.text: ... Ça ne te regarde pas !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.orig: Get off this ship and back to the game ye came from!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.text: Casse-toi de ce navire et retourne dans ton trou !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.orig: Foolish mortal, do you truly believe we will abide by your command?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.text: Stupide mortel, Tu penses pouvoir nous donner des ordres ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.orig: ... Did ye just call me a "mortal", ye nutcase?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.text: ... C'est moi que tu viens d'appeler "mortel", bouffon ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.orig: Ye better leave right now or I'll be glad to tighten yer grip on reality!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.text: Tire-toi, avant que je me fasse le plaisir de te réduire en bouillie !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.orig: You bore us.\. We choose to no longer converse with the likes of you.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.text: Tu nous ennuies.\. Nous allons plus perdre notre temps à converser avec des gens comme vous.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.orig: Besides, our search has already been concluded.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.text: De plus, nous avons déjà trouvé ce que nous cherchions.
... Salut...

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.orig: You.\. You do not belong here.\. You need to be removed.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.text: Toi !\. Tu n'as rien à faire ici.\. Tu dois être supprimée.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.orig: Wait, you seem all too familiar.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.text: Attends, Ton apparence nous semble familière.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.orig: Why, it can't be...
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.text: Mais... Ce n'est pas possible...

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.orig: Indeed, it might be a mere coincidence!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.text: Effectivement, ce n'est peut-être qu'une simple coïncidence !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.orig: Oh, but we most definitely have a way to be certain!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/149/s.text: Mais nous avons un moyen absolu d'en être sûr !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/150/s.orig: I don't even know what to say!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/150/s.text: Je ne sais pas quoi dire !
Qu'est-ce qui vient de se passer ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/150/s.orig: I mean... seriously?\. What's next?\. Cyborg sea serpents?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/150/s.text: J'veux dire, sérieusement ?\. C'est quoi la suite ?\. Des serpents de mer cyborgs ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/150/s.orig: This is the best day, man!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/150/s.text: C'est le meilleur jour de tous les temps !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/151/s.orig: In all my years on this ship, this kind of thing never happened.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/151/s.text: Depuis tout le temps que je suis ici, ce genre de truc n'est jamais arrivé !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/153/s.orig: That went...\. \c[1]much more quickly\c[0] than we anticipated.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/153/s.text: C'était...\. \c[1]bien plus rapide\c[0] que ce que nous attendions.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/153/s.orig: We...\. may have misjudged your \c[1]character level\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/153/s.text: Nous...\. avons peut-être sous-estimé le \c[1]niveau de ton personnage\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/153/s.orig: This spinning motion, one cannot find it twice in this world.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/153/s.text: Ces mouvements virevoltants... on ne les trouve pas deux fois dans ce monde.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/153/s.orig: Truly, there is no doubt about it!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/153/s.text: Vraiment, il n'y a plus aucun doute !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/153/s.orig: When was the last time we have laid eyes upon you?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/153/s.text: Depuis quand n'avons-nous pas posé notre regard sur toi ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/153/s.orig: Yes, you have our utmost interest!\. You will come with us.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/153/s.text: Oui, tu mérites notre plus grand intérêt !\. Tu vas venir avec nous.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/153/s.orig: Greetings from the Solar Fist, ye pile of instant matter!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/153/s.text: Dis bonjour à mon Solar Fist, sale tas d'Instant-matière !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/153/s.orig: What's this? Yer divine powers can't handle a proper explosion?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/153/s.text: Ben alors ? Tes pouvoirs divins ne résistent pas à une petite explosion ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/153/s.orig: Okay, lass.\. Ye need to get off this ship.\. Right NOW!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/153/s.text: Écoute, fillette.\. Il faut que tu partes du navire.\. MAINTENANT !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/153/s.orig: Carla!\. Get her back to the teleporter as fast as possible.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/153/s.text: Carla !\. Ramène là au téléporteur aussi vite que possible !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/153/s.orig: And tell me once she's off the ship.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/153/s.text: Et préviens-moi lorsqu'elle aura quitté le navire.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/153/s.orig: I'll make sure no trace of CrossWorlds is left on my ship!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/153/s.text: Je vais faire en sorte qu'il ne reste plus aucune trace de CrossWorlds sur mon navire !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/154/s.orig: Dude...\. I know you're new around here, but really, ya gotta be more relaxed about all this.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/154/s.text: Mec...\. Je sais que tu es nouveau ici, mais il faut que tu te lâches un peu.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/154/s.orig: What? Just because I was too quick about cleaning duty?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/154/s.text: Pourquoi ? Uniquement parce que j'ai fini le ménage trop rapidement ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/154/s.orig: Well, if ya keep this up, \c[5]people will notice\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/154/s.text: Mais si tu continues, \c[5]les gens vont le remarquer\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/154/s.orig: Oh hey! You're that avatar girl right?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/154/s.text: Oh hé ! Tu es cette fille avatar, non ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/154/s.orig: I was just giving our newbie here a lesson.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/154/s.text: J'étais juste en train d'expliquer au nouveau comment les choses fonctionnent ici.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/154/s.orig: Hey! I've been working here for 6 months!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/154/s.text: Hé ! Je travaille ici depuis déjà 6 mois !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/154/s.orig: Ya sure? Before ya know it, ya'll be cleaning da whole deck front to back every day.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/154/s.text: Fais gaffe. Avant que tu ne t'en rendes compte, tu vas te retrouver à devoir nettoyer le pont entier tous les jours.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/167/s.orig: Ye darn pile of instant matter!
Stop puttin' yer trash all over the ship!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/167/s.text: Arrête de foutre du bazar sur mon navire !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/167/s.orig: He tried to stop us, but thanks to Lea's \c[1]damage hack\c[0] he did not stand a chance.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/167/s.text: Il a essayé de nous arrêter, mais grâce aux \c[1]dégâts piratés\c[0] de Lea, il n'avait aucune chance.
Mais il nous a presque eus.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/167/s.orig: There are probably some enemies left down in the cargo hold.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/167/s.text: Il doit encore rester quelques ennemis en bas dans les cales.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/167/s.orig: Puttin' even more trash in my cargo hold?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/167/s.text: Tu me rajoutes encore plus de foutoir dans mes cales ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/167/s.orig: Okay, that's it, play time is over!!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/167/s.text: Allez mon gars, maintenant c'est fini de jouer !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/167/s.orig: You're meddling with matters that are not of your concern...
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/167/s.text: Tu te mêles de choses qui ne te concernent pas.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/167/s.orig: Dobbers like you messin' with my ship are on the bloody top of my list of concerns!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/167/s.text: Et des imbéciles comme toi qui viennent foutre le bazar sur mon navire, c'est tout en haut de la liste des choses qui me concernent !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/167/s.orig: I said it before, I'll say it again:
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/167/s.text: Je vais le répéter encore pour toi :

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/167/s.orig: This cargo ship is not part of the bloody Playground!!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/167/s.text: Ce porte-conteneur ne fait pas partie du satané Terrain de jeu !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/167/s.orig: What the bloody hell was all that about?!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/167/s.text: C'était quoi le but de tout ce foutoir ?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/167/s.note: de contains "diable" (said after jet defeats gauth)

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: Initializing avatar
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text: Initialisation avatar

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: Good morning, Lea!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text: Bonjour, Lea !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: Hi.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text: Salut.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: I hope you...\. rested well.\. Any new memories?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text: J'espère que tu as...\. bien dormi.\. Tu as eu d'autres souvenirs ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: [shakes head]
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: I see.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text: Je vois.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: Well then...\. preparations to go back to the official Playground are all finished!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text:
Bon alors...\.
Les préparations pour ton retour sur le Terrain de jeu sont terminées !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: We will have to leave using the teleporter down in the cargo hold.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text: Il faut que l'on quitte le navire à partir du téléporteur dans la soute.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: Remember the one where we started?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text: Celui ou tout a commencé, tu te souviens ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text: [acquiesce]

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: Carla should be waiting there for you.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text: Carla t'attend déjà en bas.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: Also...\. I did a few more preparations on my side...
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text: Sinon...\. J'ai aussi fait quelques préparations de mon côté...

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: How?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text: Comment ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: Well...\. I \c[3]moved locations\c[0] again.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text: Eh bien...\. J'ai encore \c[3]déménagé\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: Why?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text: Pourquoi ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: Just making sure nobody will be able to locate me.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text: Pour être sûr que personne ne puisse me localiser.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: I did the same after you completed the Faj'ro Temple.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text: Je l'ai déjà fait quand tu as fini le Temple de Faj'ro.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: That is why we had to stay offline for a while longer, remember?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text: C'était pour cela que tu es restée hors-ligne pendant un moment, tu te souviens ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: Anyway, things should be less critical since we are out of Vermillion Wasteland.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text: Maintenant, vu que l'on est sorti de \v[area.arid.name], les choses devraient être plus tranquilles.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: Then again...\. they most likely still have ways to track us in the official Playground.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text:
Mais d'un autre côté...\.
Ils doivent encore avoir un moyen de nous suivre à la trace dans le Terrain de jeu.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: Otherwise, they could not have dragged us out of the raid like that.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text: Sinon, ils n'auraient pas pu nous sortir du Raid aussi facilement.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: I still wonder how exactly they managed to do that.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text: Je me demande encore comment ils ont réussi à faire ça.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: Maybe they can read the traces we leave on the game servers...
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text: Peut-être qu'ils peuvent suivre nos traces sur les serveurs du jeu...

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: Or maybe it is something very simple... like somebody watching us in-game.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text: Ou peut-être quelque chose de bien plus simple... Par exemple, quelqu'un qui nous espionne dans le jeu.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: Well...\. it is all speculation at this point.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text: Oui bon...\. Pour l'instant ce ne sont que des hypothèses.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: But we should be careful and watch our surroundings, okay?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text: Mais il faut que l'on soit plus prudent et que l'on surveille nos arrières, OK ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text: [acquiesce]

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: Anyway! Onwards to the teleporter.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text: Bon alors ! En avant vers le téléporteur !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.orig: Head to the \c[3]Teleporter\c[0] on \c[3]M.S. Solar\c[0] to travel back to the Playground.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/176/s.text: Allez vers le \c[3]Téléporteur\c[0] du \c[3]M.S. Solar\c[0] pour retourner sur le Terrain de Jeu.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/177/s.orig: Cleaning duty again... That's like 5 times in a row now.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/177/s.text: Encore de corvée de nettoyage... Ça va faire la cinquième fois à la suite !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/177/s.orig: See? I warned you! Now you are the cleaning maniac of the ship.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/177/s.text: Tu vois ? Je t'avais prévenu ! Maintenant tu es officiellement l'homme de ménage du bateau !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/177/s.orig: People will keep loading off cleaning duty onto you as long as you keep being so quick and thorough about it.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/177/s.text: C'est évident que les gens vont te refiler leurs corvées de ménage tant que tu continueras à les faire correctement et rapidement !

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/177/s.orig: I'm not exactly complaining, you know?
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/177/s.text: Je suis pas vraiment en train de me plaindre là, tu sais ?

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/177/s.orig: I like this kind of work and the ship has been in a much better condition since I took over.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/177/s.text: Je fais ça volontiers, et le bateau est en bien meilleur état depuis que j'ai pris le relai.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/177/s.orig: Alright, whatever floats your boat, dude.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/177/s.text: Tu fais ce que tu veux ! Tant que le bateau ne coule pas, moi ça me va.

maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/177/s.orig: Well, this boat probably doesn't float because of my cleaning, but it certainly looks better!
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/177/s.text: Ben, ce bateau ne flotte certainement pas à cause de mon ménage, mais il est bien plus propre qu'avant !
Fais ce que tu veux, mec.
maps/cargo-ship/ship.json/entities/177/s.note: de: Des cœurs comme toi qui polissent je ne vais jamais l'interdire !
